entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few flurries beginning this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 7:07 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 7:07 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
